name: 18V Cordless Finish Nailer
description: The NT1865DA cordless finish nailer does not require a gas cartridge to operate. This results in a considerably lower running cost than gas-powered nailers.

name: 18V Cordless Work Light
description: Depending on the battery condition and operating environment, the actual remaining battery charge may not match what is displayed on the remaining battery indicator. When UB18DD is used with a power cord, the indicator light remains off.

name: 18V Cordless Driver Drill
description: Weight according to EPTA-Procedure 01/2014. The weight differs depending on the attached battery. The heaviest weight is measured with the BSL36B18 battery (sold separately).
